00136 void CnipolSpinStudyHists::Fill(ChannelEvent *ch)
00137 {
00138    UChar_t  chId = ch->GetChannelId();
00139    UChar_t  bId  = ch->GetBunchId() + 1;
00140    string   sSS  = gRunConfig.AsString( gMeasInfo->GetBunchSpin(bId) );
00141    //Double_t time = ((Double_t) ch->GetRevolutionId())/RHIC_REVOLUTION_FREQ;
00142 
00143    const std::vector<UInt_t>& spinFlipperMarkers = gMeasInfo->GetSpinFlipperMarkers();
00144    UInt_t spinFlipperMarkerRevId = spinFlipperMarkers.size() > 0 ? spinFlipperMarkers[0] : 0;
00145 
00146    Double_t phase = _TWO_PI * (gMeasInfo->GetAcDipolePeriod()/_RHIC_AC_DIPOLE_MAX_PERIOD) * ((Double_t) ch->GetRevolutionId() + (bId-1)/120. - spinFlipperMarkerRevId);
00147    phase = fmod(phase, _TWO_PI);
00148 
00149    //Double_t delta_phase = gMeasInfo->GetSpinFlipperPhase();
00150 
00151    ((TH2*) o.find("hChVsOscillPhase_" + sSS)->second) -> Fill(phase, chId);
00152 }

00154 
00156 void CnipolSpinStudyHists::FillDerived()
00157 {
00158    Info("FillDerived()", "Called");
00159 
00160    TH2* hChVsOscillPhase  = (TH2*) o["hChVsOscillPhase"];
00161    TH2* hDetVsOscillPhase = (TH2*) o["hDetVsOscillPhase"];
00162 
00163    SpinStateSetIter iSS = gRunConfig.fSpinStates.begin();
00164    for ( ; iSS!=gRunConfig.fSpinStates.end(); ++iSS)
00165    {
00166       string sSS = gRunConfig.AsString(*iSS);
00167 
00168       TH2* hChVsOscillPhase_       = (TH2*) o["hChVsOscillPhase_"  + sSS];
00169       TH2* hDetVsOscillPhase_      = (TH2*) o["hDetVsOscillPhase_" + sSS];
00170 
00171       for (int iCh=1; iCh<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS; iCh++)
00172       {
00173          // Fill detector histograms from the channel ones
00174          // Skip disabled channels
00175          if (gMeasInfo->IsDisabledChannel(iCh)) continue;
00176 
00177          UShort_t iDet = RunConfig::GetDetectorId(iCh);
00178 
00179          for (int iBin=1; iBin<=hDetVsOscillPhase_->GetNbinsX(); iBin++)
00180          {
00181             Double_t bc_ch  = hChVsOscillPhase_->GetBinContent(iBin, iCh);
00182             Double_t bc_det = hDetVsOscillPhase_->GetBinContent(iBin, iDet);
00183             hDetVsOscillPhase_->SetBinContent(iBin, iDet, bc_det + bc_ch);
00184          }
00185       }
00186 
00187       hChVsOscillPhase->Add(hChVsOscillPhase_);
00188       hDetVsOscillPhase->Add(hDetVsOscillPhase_);
00189    }
00190 }

00194 void CnipolSpinStudyHists::PostFill()
00195 {
00196    TH2& hDetVsOscillPhase_up   = (TH2&) *o.find("hDetVsOscillPhase_up")->second;
00197    TH2& hDetVsOscillPhase_down = (TH2&) *o.find("hDetVsOscillPhase_down")->second;
00198    TH1& hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45 = (TH1&) *o.find("hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45")->second;
00199    TH1& hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45 = (TH1&) *o.find("hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45")->second;
00200 
00201    gAsymCalculator.CalcOscillPhaseAsymSqrtFormula(hDetVsOscillPhase_up, hDetVsOscillPhase_down, hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45, AsymCalculator::X45Dets);
00202    gAsymCalculator.CalcOscillPhaseAsymSqrtFormula(hDetVsOscillPhase_up, hDetVsOscillPhase_down, hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45, AsymCalculator::Y45Dets);
00203 
00204    TF1 fitFunc("fitFunc", "[0] + [1]*sin(x + [2])", 0, _TWO_PI);
00205 
00206    hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45.Fit(&fitFunc);
00207    //hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45.Fit(&fitFunc);
00208    fitFunc.SetParNames("Offset", "Amplitude", "Phase");
00209 
00210    AsymTypeSetIter iAsymType = gRunConfig.fAsymTypes.begin();
00211    for (; iAsymType!=gRunConfig.fAsymTypes.end(); ++iAsymType)
00212    {
00213       string sAsymType        = gRunConfig.AsString(*iAsymType);
00214       TGraphErrors* graphErrs;
00215 
00216       // Fit every asymmetry type graph for X45
00217       string shName = "gr" + string(hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45.GetName()) + "_" + sAsymType;
00218       graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45.GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(shName.c_str());
00219       graphErrs->Fit(&fitFunc);
00220 
00221       // Add graphs for each bin to a single histograms
00222       TH1* hist = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45_" + sAsymType];
00223       hist->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs->Clone(), "p");
00224 
00225       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hist, 2);
00226 
00227       // Fit every asymmetry type graph for Y45
00228       shName = "gr" + string(hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45.GetName()) + "_" + sAsymType;
00229       graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45.GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject(shName.c_str());
00230       graphErrs->Fit(&fitFunc);
00231 
00232       // Add graphs for each bin to a single histograms
00233       hist = (TH1*) o["hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45_" + sAsymType];
00234       hist->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(graphErrs->Clone(), "p");
00235 
00236       utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(hist, 2);
00237    }
00238 
00239    utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(&hAsymVsOscillPhase_X45, 2);
00240    utils::UpdateLimitsFromGraphs(&hAsymVsOscillPhase_Y45, 2);
00241 }
